mapper.select: SELECT a.POST_NO /* 게시글번호 */ , a.HIT /* 조회수 */ , TO_CHAR(a.BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_DATE /* 게시글작성일자 */ , b.CMT /* 댓글수 */ , a.TITLE /* 게시글제목 */ FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , TITLE , CONTENTS , HIT , BOARD_DATE , RANK() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC) AS RK FROM BOARD WHERE CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND DEL = 1 ) a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT POST_NO , COUNT(POST_NO) AS CMT FROM BOARD_CMT GROUP BY POST_NO ) b ON a.POST_NO = b.POST_NO WHERE a.RK BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY a.BOARD_DATE DESC

SELECT a.JOURNAL_NO /* 여행일지번호 */ , a.NIC /* 유저닉네임 */ , a.MEM_NO /* 유저번호 */ , a.HIT /* 조회수 */ , TO_CHAR(a.JOURNAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AS JOURNAL_DATE /* 여행일지작성일자 */ , a.REGION_NAME /* 지역명 */ , CASE WHEN a.MONTH >= 10 THEN a.MONTH ELSE SUBSTR(a.MONTH, 2) END AS MONTH /* 당월 */ , b.CMT /* 댓글수 */ , a.TITLE /* 여행일지제목 */ FROM ( SELECT a.JOURNAL_NO , a.TITLE , c.NIC , c.MEM_NO , a.HIT , a.JOURNAL_DATE , RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY b.SUB_CATEGORY_NO ORDER BY a.HIT DESC)AS RK , b.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME AS REGION_NAME , a.REGION_NO , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE(), 'MM') AS MONTH FROM JOURNAL a INNER JOIN JOURNAL_CATEGORY b ON b.CATEGORY_NO = 1 AND a.REGION_NO = b.SUB_CATEGORY_NO INNER JOIN MEM c ON c.MEM_NO = a.MEM_NO AND c.LEAVE_DATE IS NULL WHERE TO_CHAR(a.JOURNAL_DATE, 'YY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE(), 'YY')
AND TO_CHAR(a.JOURNAL_DATE, 'MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE(), 'MM')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.JOURNAL_DATE, '%U') = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%U')
) a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT a.JOURNAL_NO , COUNT(*) AS CMT FROM JOURNAL a INNER JOIN JOURNAL_CMT b ON a.JOURNAL_NO = b.JOURNAL_NO AND b.DEL = 1 GROUP BY a.JOURNAL_NO ) b ON a.JOURNAL_NO = b.JOURNAL_NO WHERE a.RK BETWEEN 1 AND 10 AND a.REGION_NO = #{region_no} ORDER BY a.HIT DESC
